extension.name: IDS import
extension.author: @iLabAfrica
extension.description:
You've successfully installed the Content - IDS KS Open API Joomla Plugin and IDS Import Component for Joomla.

1. Go to Extensions > Plug-in Manager and search for the Content - IDS KS Open API Joomla Plugin.
2. Open the plugin, set its status to Enabled and specify a valid API Key. If you don't have one, you can register for one at http://api.ids.ac.uk/accounts/register/
3. Access the IDS Import Component through Components > IDS Import menu.

You'll be set to import content from IDS to your website.
